item.title: Revolut finally receives UK banking licence after three-year wait
item.description:
Move paves way for fintech firm to hold customers’ deposits and offer own-branded loans, including mortgages

Revolut has secured a UK banking licence – with “restrictions” – more than three years after Britain’s most valuable fintech firm lodged its application with regulators.

It is a milestone for the company, and will help pave the way for an eventual stock market listing, but it may still be some time before it can hold its customers’ deposits.

Continue reading...

Get the Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic for its lowest price yet
item.description: As of July 25, get the Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic for its lowest price yet: $278.56 at Amazon. That's 30% off.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 just dropped to under $150 at Amazon
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Watch 4 (40mm, Bluetooth) is on sale for $149 at Amazon, down from the normal price of $199.99. That's a 25% discount.

item.title: Anti-deepfake legislation just took a major step toward becoming law
item.description: The U.S. Senate passes AOC-backed 2024 Defiance Act amid growing concerns about AI-generated deepfakes.
